comments.body: Hi all! I'm new to kicktipp (actually haven't even signed up yet) so I'll figure out the platform first and then I'll enter the pool.Quote2 points for the correct tendency (example: predicted 3-0 - result 1-0)3 points for the correct goal difference (example: predicted 2-0 or 1-1 - result 3-1 or 3-3)4 points for the correct result (example: predicted 3-0 - result 3-0)bonus picks: 4 points per correct bonus pick**the bouns picks have to be done before the start of the seasonWhat is a bonus pick? I didn't participate last year and don't know what it is. I'm guessing it's about who will take the title, but the terms say "picks", not a pick, so I'm guessing it's something more extensive.
